item.description: Walmartâ€™s unannounced cloud gaming service detailed in confidential Epic emails (3 minute read) Project Storm is Walmart’s attempt at a cloud gaming service.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-29
item.description: Apple vs. Epic hearing previews a long, hard-fought trial to come (3 minute read) Epic’s request for a temporary injunction in its case against Apple was heard recently.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-18
item.description: Apple Threatens to Terminate Epic Games' Developer Accounts on August 28 (3 minute read) Apple plans to terminate Epic Games' access to its App Store and app development tools by August 28.
